headline: HUNTINGTON BUTTERFLY VACUUM VALVE ISO-K 4"
specstable:
Manufacturer Huntington
Model A00-1549
Valve Actuation Pneumatic
Flange Type ISO-K
Flange Size 100.00 mm (3.94 in)
Valve Material Stainless Steel
Other Information

Pressure range: ATM to 1 x 10-9 torr
Operating temperature: -20°C to 100°C
Material exposed to vacuum stainless steel and Viton
Bake out temperature: 200°C(with actuator removed)
Air required: 60 to 120 psi

Condition Like New
Exterior Dimensions
Width 7.000 in (17.8 cm)
Depth 10.000 in (25.4 cm)
Height 9.000 in (22.9 cm)
Weight 20 lb (9 kg)
